body_html: I think torch.dist is very limited as pointed out by @aron-bordin , and I think we should maybe extend it like we extended max / min (long time ago) to support a dimension, and if the dimension is not passed, fall back to the old behavior. What do you think?

body: I think `torch.dist` is very limited as pointed out by @aron-bordin , and I think we should maybe extend it like we extended `max` / `min` (long time ago) to support a dimension, and if the dimension is not passed, fall back to the old behavior. What do you think?
